shri lanka nidahas pakshaye sabhapathithwayata path kara ganna lada maithripala sirisena janadhipathiwaraya wanahi eksath jathika pakshaya, janatha wimukthi peramuna, jathika hela urumaya, demala jathika sandhanaya, muslim paksha aadiya ekathu wi siya chandayen path kara ganna lada nayakayeki.
